name: Mighty (Hychana)
description:
MIGHTY! Is a fast-paced and punishing top-down action/fighting game.

Endless Levels

Fight inside hundreds of cramped corridors, tiny rooms and limited spaces

Nine unique level themes, each with unique enemies

Endless procedural-generated level layouts, complete with secrets and loot!

Fast-paced combat

Battle 60+ different kinds of enemies

Encounter different enemies and bosses in each level

Dance on the corpse of a fallen foe to claim their power for yourself!

Unlimited Build Potential

Find 50+ different kinds of charms and 20+ different kinds of weapons

Unlock up to eight charm slots for complex strategizing and stat min/maxing

Merchants accept charms as payment and weapons break over time, forcing fluid changes in play style

More content coming soon!
